=== PROUD TO BE CANADIAN (Ver 2) ===

--- Ultimate Guitar Version ---
Source: Ultimate Guitar (Samhain138)
Artist: Dayglo Abortions
Album: Feed Us A Fetus
Tuning: Standard (E-A-D-G-B-E)
Difficulty: Beginner

Tabbed by: Savas Varadas (samhain_138@hotmail.com)

Follow along with the song for the rythmn
